hirondelle.starfield.catalog.parser

Interface RecordParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HenryDraperCatalog, TestParser, Tycho2Catalog, YaleBrightStarCatalog

    public interface RecordParser
    Create a Star object from a single record in a star catalog. Assumes that a single line in the file corresponds to a single star.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Star parse(String aLine)
      Parse a single line from a star catalog into the parts needed for the starfield calculation.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        Star parse(String aLine)
        Parse a single line from a star catalog into the parts needed for the starfield calculation. In many cases the data will have to be massaged a bit to get the exact data needed by the Star class.

        Parsers must return null if the line cannot be parsed into a Star object. This can happen when the data is wonky for some reason. For example, the Yale Bright Star Catalog has a number of entries that are essentially blank.

        All angles must be converted to radians. Be careful of the sign of the declination.
